amendment.description: An amendment numbered 60 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds for the Secretary of Homeland Secretary from traveling outside of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Hageman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
